name: Bulgarian Society for Rail Transport
goal:
The designation of this association is to make popular transcontinental multi-modal railway transport by the widest choice of means. Its activity covers the elaboration of research, educational and socially useful designs, as well as:
- information and publication of significant events in the sphere of railway transport;
- activation of generators of alternative ideas;
- New Silk Road Project;
- Bulgarian High Speed Railway Network;
- Inter-modal connections in Bulgarian City Conglomerations;
interests: Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Railway Infrastructure.
Railway Passenger and Freight Transport.
Tramway Infrastructure.
Tramway Passenger Transport.
Metro Infrastructure.
Metro Passenger Transport.
